1: <pb/>U rikom c'ax ri Crist pa ri u cuerp, rumal ri' xukuje' ri ix chisuc'umaj iwib che u rikic ri c'ax. Ri jun c'ut ri curik c'ax pa ri u cuerp, u yo'm c'u can ri mac.
2: <pb/>Pa tak ri u k'ij ri c'o na cho ri uwächulew, man cuban ta chic ri itzel qui rayibal ri winak, xane' cuban na ri u rayibal ri Dios.
3: <pb/>Chubana' c'u chiwe ri i chac pa tak ri k'ij ri xeboc'ow canok, aretak xiban ri jastak ri cäquirayij ri man e cojonelab taj. Xiban ronojel ri xiwaj, xiban ronojel ri itzel i rayibal, xixk'abaric, xiban nimalaj mac aretak ximulij iwib che nimak tak wa'im, ximulij iwib che u tijic tzam, xebik'ijilaj tak diosib ri e tz'il.
4: <pb/>E are ri man e cojonelab taj caquimayo, rumal rech chi man quebiwachilaj ta chic che u banic q'ui jastak xak jas ri cäcaj, jas ri xiban nabe. Quixquiyok' c'ut.
5: <pb/>Rajawaxic c'ut chi cäquibij na jas ri qui banom chuwäch ri cuk'at na tzij paquiwi' ri c'asc'oj xukuje' ri cäminakib.
6: <pb/>Rumal ri' ri tzij rech colobal ib kas xk'alajisax chque ri e cäminak chic, rech ri tzij rech colobal ib cäcuinic cuk'attzij paquiwi' jas kas ri u cholajil ri c'aslemal ri xcuc'aj we winak ri' pa ri ti'jol. Xukuje' xtzijox ri tzij rech caya' k'ijol chi cac'oji' qui c'aslemal pa ri uxlabal jas kas ri u rayibal ri Dios.
7: <pb/>Cäpe c'u na ri k'ij aretak queq'uis conojel ri jastak. Utz ba' chixchomanok, chichomaj jas ri quibano, rech utz quiban che ri ch'awem ruc' Dios.
8: <pb/><f>[15]</f> <f>[16]</f>Puwi' ronojel, chicojo' i chuk'ab che u lok'ok'exic iwib, rumal rech chi ri lok'ok'ebal c'u'x cubano chi quesachtaj q'ui mac.
9: <pb/>Chiyala' okxanibal chbil iwib, man ruc' ta ch'ach'atem.
10: <pb/>Chiyala' iwe chijujunal jas ri yo'm chiwe rumal ri Dios, je jas utzalaj tak e chajil re ronojel u wäch u tok'ob ri Dios.
11: <pb/>We c'o jun cätzijonic, je chtzijonok jas ri e u tzij ri Dios. We c'o jun cäpataninic, chpataninok je jas ruc' ri cuinem ri cuya' ri Dios. Jeri' pa ronojel cänimarisax u k'ij ri Dios rumal ri Jesucrist, ri nim u k'ij xukuje' ri c'o u cuinem amak'el chbe k'ij sak. Je chbanok.
12: <pb/>Lok'alaj tak wachalal, mixmayin che ri c'ax ri quiriko, je ta ne jun k'ak' ri cänicow chixo'l. Are cäpe piwi' che u k'alajisaxic we utz quibano o man utz taj. Miwilo je ta ne ri quic'ulmaj jun jasach ri man iweta'm taj.
13: <pb/>Xane' chixquicotok, rumal rech chi quic'am iwe ri u c'axc'olil ri Crist. Jeri' xukuje' aretak quiwil na chi cäpe ri Crist, nim u k'ij cäpetic, quixquicot na ruc' nimalaj quicotemal.
14: <pb/><f>[17]</f>We quixyok' rumal rech ri Crist, utz iwe, are c'u ri Ruxlabal ri Dios, ri nim u k'ij, cäc'oji' iwuc'.
15: <pb/>We c'o jun chiwe curik c'ax, ma ta u mac rech chi cämisanel, eläk'om, o banal apachique etzelal, mawi rumal u nimic rib chquipam jastak ri e quech niq'uiaj winak chic.
16: <pb/>We c'u curik c'ax rumal rech chi cäbix ajcrist che, mäq'uixic, xane' chunimarisaj u k'ij ri Dios rumal wa'.
17: <pb/>Xurik ri k'ij aretak cächaplex ri k'atoj tzij paquiwi' ri e aj uwo rachoch ri Dios. We c'u nabe cächaplex kuc' uj, ¿jas c'u lo ri qui q'uistajic ri winak ri man queniman ta che ri u tzij ri Dios?
18: <pb/>We ri suc'alaj winak ruc' c'ax cacolotajic, ¿jas lo cuc'ulmaj na ri ajmac xukuje' ri winak ri man cuya' ta u k'ij ri Dios?
19: <pb/>Je c'u ri', ri winak ri cäquirik c'ax jas ri u rayibal ri Dios, chquibana' utzil, chquijacha' ri canima' che ri Dios, ri jic winakirisanel.
